import React from 'react' function Search(props) { return (

{props.word}

{props.renderStems()}

{props.shortdef}

{props.quote1Text &&

{props.quote1Text}

} {props.quote1Author &&

{props.quote1Author}

}
{props.quote2Text &&

}
) } export default Search
